amendment.description: An amendment numbered 13 printed in Part D of House Report 118-216 to reduce funding by 50% for USAID.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce funding by 50% for USAID.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Crane amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 102 - 326 (Roll no. 464).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Crane amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 102 - 326 (Roll no. 464).
